TestData.Comment:
Data for OpenTabulate's XML parsing unit test. Tests for correct handling of empty tags, missing tags and general output. Moreover, injected data (to province
What this dataset is not tested for: * SYNTAX FEATURES AND NUANCES (see docs) such as: manual data injection, concatenation, filtering and custom scripts. * Address parsing * Cleaning
